replies.body:
Its scary.... My internet is literally made of shit. I time out in skype calls all day erry day thanks to Verizon. But i also time out 3x in 9 seconds average on avicus...

ive asked numerous mods they all say its my internet. Hah.

replies.body: I joined Quintus yesterday, managed to get the full set of armor, as I was putting it on, I timed out. I rejoined another game of Quintus a couple of minutes later, and the same thing happened, as soon as I got the full set, I timed out. .-.
